title: Sazameki no Machikado
description: is an album containing BGM tracks and insert songs from the second part of the Nijigasaki High School Idol Club movie triology. It also contains partial solo versions of Yakusoku ni Nare Bokura no Uta.

infobox.Image: Nijigasaki The Movie Final Chapter Part 2 OST Sazameki no Machikado.jpg
infobox.Artist: Naoki Endo & Nijigasaki High School Idol Club
infobox.Label: Lantis
